sen.e: FUJIWARA no Mitsuko (1060 - May 4, 1121) was a court lady in the late Heian period.

sen.e: She became a mistress of FUJIWARA no Kinzane and gave birth to 8 children including FUJIWARA no Michisue, 僧仁実, FUJIWARA no Saneyoshi, 僧覚源, FUJIWARA no Koshi, FUJIWARA no Jisshi, and FUJIWARA no Shoshi (Tai ken mon in).
